creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
A serializer that would accept a html template would allow for easier
templating, which is what users sometimes want. The xhtml path has proven to be
difficult or still too hard for some users. Maybe a serializer that accepts a
html template would be the way to go?


------- Additional Comments From Gregor J. Rothfuss 2003-04-08 17:23 -------

the coocoon serializer applies jtidy by default now when it encounters 
the .html extension
